amendatorysection.catchline: Department; assessment and collection of payments for services.
amendatorysection.para: The department may assess and collect payment for services provided and expenses incurred pursuant to its responsibilities under the Bovine Tuberculosis Act and the rules and regulations adopted and promulgated pursuant thereto. All payments assessed and collected pursuant to this section shall be remitted to the State Treasurer for credit to the Bovine Tuberculosis Cash Fund.
